text: Ronald Wright Routledge (born 14 October 1937) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Sportspeople from Ashington Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Ashington A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people
title: Ron Routledge
